description: InternetAccessible describes network interfaces for CXM.

addressID.description: The ID of the EIP instance, like `eip-hxlqja90`.

addressType.description: Resource type of the EIP, including `EIP` (elastic IP).

bandwidthPackageID.description: Bandwidth package ID. To obatin the IDs.

chargeType.description: ChargeType specify the network connection billing plan. Default `TrafficPostpaidByHour`

maxBandwidthOut.description: The maximum outbound bandwidth of the public network, in Mbps. The default value is 1 Mbps. For more information, see [Purchase Network Bandwidth](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/213/12523?from_cn_redirect=1).

publicIPAssigned.description: PublicIPAssigned indicates whether the public IP is assigned to the instance.
